attributes.action: dissolve parliament and call a general election immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A dissolution of parliament is the only way to secure the public interest and confidence in the government and members of parliament in light of the expenses scandal.  Which are the good apples among the bad?  The public should be presented with the facts and decide where to place their trust.  The institutions of government have become corrupted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
